hotels.title: Heritage-Listed All-Suite Escape in Victoria’s Yarra Valley with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
hotels.description: Escape to the wine-filled countryside of the Yarra Valley with a stay at this historic chateau. Ideally located just an hour’s drive from Melbourne CBD, this is one of Victoria’s best gourmet destinations where food, wine and art are at their finest - and the natural scenery is second to none. While away the day in the cosy library or pop in for a meal at Eleonore’s Restaurant, where French and Australian dishes are served in a grand Victorian-style dining hall. Enjoy a coffee at Sweetwater Café or, should you be visiting on the weekend, book in for traditional high tea, complete with ribbon sandwiches and scones. Spend a sunny day exploring the heritage-listed gardens designed by Baron von Mueller (also behind Melbourne’s Royal Botanic Gardens), or enjoy a hit of tennis on the pristine courts.

hotels.title: Yarra Valley Lodge Retreat Overlooking Championship Golf Course
hotels.description: It’s no secret that the Yarra Valley in Victoria is teeming with treasures, but one of the best hidden gems waiting to be uncovered is Yarra Valley Lodge, set within the Heritage Golf & Country Club. From the moment you arrive, prepare to feel instantly at ease within each of the contemporary rooms or suites, with each one carefully designed to reflect the beauty of the surrounding vineyards. Relax with a glass of wine in hand at the sophisticated onsite eatery, Bella Restaurant and enjoy a farm-to-table dinner served with the freshest seasonal ingredients, or practice your skills on the Jack Nicklaus-designed, St. John golf course. Beyond the lodge, there’s no shortage of exceptional wineries, distilleries, boutique shops, galleries and national parks to keep you entertained.
